```{r setup, include=FALSE}
data <- read.csv("data/saundersW19_RBdata.csv")
```



```{r}
View(data)
pairs(data)

View(abs(cor(data)[,1]))

model <- lm(Y ~ X10, data = data)

pairs(cbind(R = model$res, Fit = model$fit, data), col = factor(data$X4))

data$X11 <- ifelse(data$X4 == 0, 1, 0)
data$X12 <- ifelse(data$X4 == 1, 1, 0)

model2 <- lm(Y ~ X10 + X11 + X12 + X10:X11 + X10:X12, data = data)
summary(model2)

pairs(cbind(R = model2$res, Fit = model2$fit, data), col = factor(data$X4))

plot(model2$re ~ data$X10)

plot(model2, which = 1)

library(car)
boxCox(model2)


model3 <- lm(Y ~ I(X10^1.5) + (X4==0) + (X4==1) + I(X10^1.5):(X4==0) + I(X10^1.5):(X4==1), data = data)
summary(model3)
plot(model3, which = 1)
boxCox(model3)

c <- model2$coef

plot(Y ~ X10, col = factor(data$X4), data = data)
abline(c[1] + c[2])
```
